title: Project to Strengthen Intercultural Online Collaboration Competencies for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Online Collaboration Tool Usage Experience and Multicultural Education Concept Understanding
context.additional_context: Project-based learning environments for cultivating global collaboration skills among pre-service teachers from an international perspective

learning_goals: Learners can identify at least three communication barriers in cross-cultural online collaboration and develop resolution strategies
Learners can produce collaborative outputs with international team members using tools like Slack and Zoom
Learners can analyze conflict cases in cross-cultural collaboration and improve collaboration effectiveness by 20% or more
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
